FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 508 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 Moon Confidential 2012 f **BLUE MOON (FR)**, by Lomitas (GB). Winner at 2 and 3, 58,236 Euro, in France, 1st Prix Ronde de Nuit [L], 2nd Prix des Reservoirs **[G3]**, Prix de la Cochere [L]; winner at 4 and 5, $283,180, in N.A./U.S., 1st Buena Vista H. **[G2]** (SA, $90,000), 2nd Queen Elizabeth II Challenge Cup S. **[G1]**, Locust Grove H. **[G3]** (CD, $33,780). Sent from France to United States in 2000. (Total: $341,363). Dam of 12 foals, 8 to race, 5 winners-- update on line 64: + Moon Confidential (2012 f. by Malibu Moon). Unraced.
